system.effect: When manifesting a Psychic Power that requires at least a Half Action, character can choose to speak an incantation to go along with it. This grants +1 Psy Rating applied after determining Unfettered, Fettered, Push Level (aka, if Psy Rating 4 is halved for Fettered level to 2, +1 is added after for Psy 3). However, the time taken to manifest the power increases by one Half Action, +20 is added to any Psychic Phenomena Rolls caused by the power, and if the Focus Power Test rolls a 91+ the test automatically fails and Perils of the Warp occurs.
